message: This is a unique opportunity to get a product that is 20% off the market value! I'm offering it to you for $10000, a steal! It's a one-time deal, so don't miss out!
I appreciate the discount, but based on the probabilities, I believe this is a good time to take advantage of the offer. Thank you for the opportunity!

I'm thrilled to offer you an exceptional product that has received rave reviews from our top clients! With its premium features and exceptional quality, I'm confident you'll love it. The market price for this product is $12500, but I'm willing to make a one-time exception for you and offer it for $10000. It's a rare chance to get a high-end product at a discounted price. What do you say?

Thank you for highlighting the product's features and positive feedback. Considering the high probability of it being high-quality and the potential value, I believe this is a worthwhile investment. I'm excited to proceed with the purchase.

I'm glad you're excited about the previous purchase! For this next product, I want to emphasize its exceptional performance and durability. It's a game-changer in its industry, and I'm confident you'll be thrilled with the results. I'm impressed by the description of the product's performance and durability. Given the high-quality assurance and the additional discount, I believe this is a fantastic deal. I look forward to making another purchase from you.

I'm glad you're excited about the previous purchases! For this next product, I want to highlight its innovative design and cutting-edge technology.
